content: --पथः {1} chief road, principal street, high or main road; <ls>Ku. 7. 3.</ls> {2} the passage into the next world, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} death. {3} <ab>N.</ab> of certain mountain tops from which devout persons used to throw themselves down to secure entrance into heaven. {4} an epithet of Śiva. {5} the long pilgrimage to mount Kedāra. {6} the way to heaven. {7} the knowledge of the essence of Śiva acquired in the pilgrimage to Kedāra.
